sumarize_req: The ITT website is a comprehensive platform providing detailed information on various travel tours, company services, featured tours, and promotions. It organizes tours into categories like Special, Japan, Asia, and Europe-Australia-America, and offers visa consultation and support. The site includes cultural articles, travel stories, and customer reviews. Multiple contact options are available, including online forms, dedicated hotlines for different service areas (individual, group, visa), email, and office address, with hotlines constantly displayed. Each tour detail page provides a full itinerary, highlights, service inclusions, pricing, terms, images, guide information, and payment/cancellation policies.
